@graph.name: Baked Sweet Potato Fries with Chipotle Ranch - Vegan Richa

itemListElement.name: Baked Sweet Potato Fries with Chipotle Ranch

@graph.name: Baked Sweet Potato Fries with Chipotle Ranch
@graph.description: Baked Sweet Potato Fries with Vegan Chipotle Ranch. Easy Crisp Sweet Potato Fries served with dairy free ranch. Vegan Appetizer Recipe Glutenfree Soyfree
recipeIngredient: 2  medium to large Sweet Potatoes (peeled and thinly sliced into thin sticks)
1 tbsp starch such as arrowroot (cornstarch or use any flour)
more salt for seasoning as needed
1/2 cup ground cashew or soaked cashews
a very generous dash of black pepper
1-2 tsp ranch seasoning (see notes) (equal amounts of dried parsley, dill, thyme, garlic powder and onion powder.)

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F / 220ºc. Peel and chop the sweet potatoes.
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F / 220ºc. Peel and chop the sweet potatoes.

itemListElement.text: Place in a very large bowl or zip lock. Add the starch, cover the bowl with a plate and dance away. Or shake the ziplock or use spoons to mix..
itemListElement.name: Place in a very large bowl or zip lock. Add the starch, cover the bowl with a plate and dance away. Or shake the ziplock or use spoons to mix..

itemListElement.text: Once the sweet potatoes are evenly coated, add oil, herbs and spices through salt and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Once the sweet potatoes are evenly coated, add oil, herbs and spices through salt and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Spread the sweet potato sticks evenly in one layer on 1 or 2 baking sheets.
itemListElement.name: Spread the sweet potato sticks evenly in one layer on 1 or 2 baking sheets.

itemListElement.text: Bake at 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 18 to 22 minutes. the sweet potatoes should be cooked through and start to get brown edges and spots. Broil for half to 1 minute to brown. Let the fries sit for 2 minutes on the sheet before transferring to a serving bowl or plate. Season with salt, black pepper and powdered nutritional yeast and serve while still warm hot. the fries get softer when they cool.
itemListElement.name: Bake at 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 18 to 22 minutes. the sweet potatoes should be cooked through and start to get brown edges and spots. Broil for half to 1 minute to brown. Let the fries sit for 2 minutes on the sheet before transferring to a serving bowl or plate. Season with salt, black pepper and powdered nutritional yeast and serve while still warm hot. the fries get softer when they cool.

itemListElement.text: Serve with chipotle ranch, plain ranch or dip of choice or ketchup.
itemListElement.name: Serve with chipotle ranch, plain ranch or dip of choice or ketchup.

itemListElement.text: Blend everything, taste and adjust salt, spice and ranch seasoning.
itemListElement.name: Blend everything, taste and adjust salt, spice and ranch seasoning.

itemListElement.text: Or mix some chipotle pepper powder in vegan mayo of choice for chipotle mayo dip. Add ranch seasoning if needed.
itemListElement.name: Or mix some chipotle pepper powder in vegan mayo of choice for chipotle mayo dip. Add ranch seasoning if needed.
